Html:
Hi Everybody,

 

In chapter 3 you have to update the stylesheet by drag and drop the images file and Site.css (downloaded from the .zip file) into the Content of the tutorial.

This doesn't work even when you say copy / paste, you cannot select paste and when you drag the files you get this forbidden icon next to your arrow. (circle with a slash)...

 

(ps I us the latest version of Visual Studio Expres 2012 for Web)

 

PLEASE HELP ME WITH A SOLUTION SO I CAN CONTINUE THIS GREAT TUTORIAL!!

In Solution Explorer right-click on folder within which you want place item and choose to import it (I forget what option is..."Choose Existing Item" perhaps.



On Dec 27, 2012, at 11:09 AM, "mducrocq68" <notifications@codeplex.com> wrote:

From: mducrocq68

Hi Everybody,

In chapter 3 you have to update the stylesheet by drag and drop the images file and Site.css (downloaded from the .zip file) into the Content of the tutorial.

This doesn't work even when you say copy / paste, you cannot select paste and when you drag the files you get this forbidden icon next to your arrow. (circle with a slash)...

PLEASE HELP ME WITH A SOLUTION SO I CAN CONTINUE THIS GREAT TUTORIAL!!

thanx for your help it is solved.

It's Right click on folder choose Add and than Existing item...

Excellent! Glad it worked!

Director, International Study Programs / Asia
EJH Group, LLC

On Dec 27, 2012, at 1:18 PM, "mducrocq68" <notifications@codeplex.com> wrote:

From: mducrocq68

thanx for your help it is solved.

It's Right click on folder choose Add and than Existing item...

I am facing the same problem.

I have tried all the above described way (drag & drop, copy &paste, adding existing item), but unfortunately its not working....

 

is there any other problem??

 

Please anyone help me.

 

Thanks in advance.
Hi, Did you first select stop debugging otherwise you cannot change or at something?
